Text:
THANK YOU NEPOTU! (and hammerac)
YOU ARE A STAR!
thank you again for this one! (Thanks hammerac!) - do you also have some old games by any chance?
You're welcome, jmbsc! What games do you need?

Much appreciation!  Couldn't find an upload here last night and decided to pop one off a torrent site in Spain (Calderon fans I suppose...). Anyway, watched all 4 qtrs, game clock reads 1:01 left to play, and the video just ends... SOoooo pissed. Thx again!
Tell what game is. If I can help, I'll do it.
I've been trying, unsuccessfully, to find a copy of the Knicks v. Nets 2.4.2012 game if you could be of any help :) Or anyone point me in a right direction?
Thanks for this. This is the first basketball game I've ever watched. All this Jeremy Lin talk intrigues me.
Bonsoir Nepotu, I am looking for NBA finals 1993 between Chicago and Phoenix for now - used to have it on VHS but it's all gone now. Thanks for asking...

Thank you Sir!! :-)
very kind... I loved that nba final... Jordan vs Sir Charles... Great moments of Basket-Ball! 
Keep the faith!!
yes indeed! all these finals I have stored it in mega up. But the "worldpolice" had other oppinion

ok no sweat - thanks for checking anyhow...
:-)

Nepotu, You're awesome! Thanks, DL'ing the link now but I'm sure it'll be great.  Much appreciation, I gave up my own search for this one when the overseas sites came up dry.  Way to look out for the minor desires/needs of a complete stranger! :) If only more of the world understood the concept... :)
Wow Nepotu, I'm a big fan. Can you please upload (knicks/jazz 2.6.12) and (knicks/mavs 2.19.12) games? #linsanity. Thanks a million

@jmbsc: I'm still looking...
@Blupo: I'm happy when a complete stranger (and also a friend) is happy! And, yes, this is the concept...
Thank you Nepotu - let me know if the gods are with you on this one... You are a great person...
